trans-unit.target: 向 UI 自动化公开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 类型。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个字符串，该字符串唯一标识与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The string that uniquely identifies the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" />.
trans-unit.target: 唯一标识 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Gets the string that describes the functionality of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取描述与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.ContentElementAutomationPeer" /> 的功能的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The string describing the functionality of the element.
trans-unit.target: 描述元素的功能的字符串。

trans-unit.source: This string typically returns the same text that is provided in the tooltip for the control.
trans-unit.target: 此字符串通常将返回控件的工具提示中提供的相同文本。

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" /> that is targeted to the <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />，该标签的目标为与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.FrameworkContentElement" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.FrameworkContentElementAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.LabelAutomationPeer" /> for the element that is targeted by the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Label" />.

For example, if the element is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox> control, the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A> method can retrieve the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label> that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果该元素是<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>控件，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetLabeledBy%2A>方法可以检索<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer>为<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Label>关联<xref:System.Windows.Controls.ComboBox>。
